::DrillBit::

"An offer i cant refuse." He said, with a grin. He walked out.
"I just hope the Maximals are smart enough not to slag us. He opened a
comm.
"Destructor, wait up. I'm on my way." He reached the exit, transformed,
and drilled after the others.

::Hot Rod::

He made his way to the Mess Hall. He sat, with a large bottel of
Energin. His love was gone, so he was going to get drunk. He hoped the
pain would leave.
